name: IndiaTourGuide
0:
”Alexa, launch india tour”
”Alexa, ask india tour about jaipur”
”Alexa, open india tour and I am planning to visit Kolkata city”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: india tour
des:
This skill is limited to 10 cities information namely:
1. Kolkata, 
2. Darjeeling, 
3. Varanasi, 
4. Agra, 
5. Delhi, 
6. Leh Ladakh, 
7. Jaipur, 
8. Goa, 
9. Kerala and
10. Pondicherry

User need to say name of the above mentioned city or call out no. from 1-10 to get brief information of city and its itinerary.

India is one of the oldest civilizations in the world, spanning a period of more than 5000 years, and witnessing the fusion of several customs and traditions, which are reflective of the rich culture and heritage of the Country..

India is bounded by the majestic snow capped Himalayan ranges in the north and edged by an endless stretch of golden beaches. Cultural and historical heritage of Rajasthan and Madhya Pradesh; Snow clad Himalayan peaks in Himachal Pradesh; the religious concentration and unexplored natural beauty of Uttaranchal / Uttarakhand; Wildlife in Bandhavgarh, Kanha, Corbett and Ranthambore; Beaches of Goa; Backwaters in Kerala – the God’s Own Country – India has a lot on offer as not just as a tourism destination but as an unforgettable experience.

We invite people from all genres of life to come and have a feel of the magic called India. The experience that has no starting or ending point but the beauty that will remain with you throughout your lifetime – an experience that is truly !ncredible …

Thanks to itripto, who helped to collect info from Anisha videos about thier itinerar

We will update this skill with information for more cities, Please rate & review our skill, it will help us to improve and provide update for the same.

Start planning your holidays in !ncredible India....
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
